text: Is this resolved yet? We are still seeing instances of this.
Hi, sorry that this skipped through the cracks, <@U03REFNRMB3>, can you resend your JSON example?

Just checking the logs, the error I’m seeing is: `ACTION_HAS_MULTIPLE_NON_GOTO_PARENTS` — meaning an actionId is being referenced as the next action in multiple other actions. You can do this if you use the `GOTO` connection type, or this might be a mistake.
Could y'all update the message to include that error.
I'll test with GOTO connection type.

We will, right now we just have very broad error messaging. One of our development tasks to is carry-through all the different validation error messages into the public API. This is fairly big effort since we want to do this in a way that you all can rely on.
